item.title: Deity tripartition
item.description: Source: TW Some gleanings can be noted of the so called ‘functional triad’ (a social tripartition based upon a ’triad of divinities’) of Mitra-Varuṇa, Indra, & the twin Ásvins (certainly not the only such grouping in Vedic literature & surely not the foremost), a common IE phenomenon. The deities Mitra & Varuṇa of the ‘first function’ are described as ‘universal monarchs’ w/both extolled as exercising authority of the whole world (ṚV 5.
